/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings and trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, rise majestically against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The trees, with their lush green foliage, add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. On the right side of the street, a yellow triangular traffic sign stands out, serving as a reminder of the city's bustling life. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting soft shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and trees.
